price: 69. Bino nde bokitisaka yango kowuta na mapata to biso nde bakitisi?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
